sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react'; import './stylesheet.css'; import './reset.css'; const api = { key:"7248eff058ba1f79c53e30c2ba0fac6e", base:"https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/" } function App() { const [query, setQuery] = useState(''); const [weather, setWeather] = useState(''); const search = evt => { if (evt.key === "Enter") { fetch(`${api.base}weather?q=${query}&units=metric&APPID=${api.key}`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(result => { setWeather(result); setQuery(''); console.log(result); }); } } const inputHandler = (event) => { setQuery(event.target.value) } return (
{(typeof weather.main != "undefined") ? (

{weather.name}, {weather.sys.country}

{Math.round(weather.main.temp)}°c

{weather.weather[0].description}

hi: {Math.round(weather.main.temp_max)}° lo: {Math.round(weather.main.temp_min)}°

Now 18 19 20
11° 8° 6° 5°
2% 0% 0% 0%
Chance of rain Humidity
2% 62%
Sunrise Sunset
06:49 17:37
Wind Pressure
2 mph 1041
) : (
Enter destination to get weather information
)}
); } export default App;
